sentences.en: Courts invalidated laws interracial marriage, struck down other barriers and even extended marriage rights to prisoners.
sentences.cn: 法院取消了混合人种间禁止结婚的法律,取消了婚姻的其他限制,甚至将婚姻权力扩大到犯人.

sentences.en: Even now, mixed couples face many obstacles, including laws restricting interracial marriage.
sentences.cn: 即使是现在, 异族男女之间的婚姻仍然面临着重重阻碍, 包括限制异族通婚的法律.

sentences.en: Facts: A Virgina statute prohibits interracial marriages between whites and blacks.
sentences.cn: 弗吉尼亚州某法禁止白人和黑人的种族间通婚.

sentences.en: Interracial marriages are becoming more accepted.
sentences.cn: 异族的通婚已越来越被接受.

sentences.en: Interracial marriages can cause many problems within the family.
sentences.cn: 跨种族婚姻能引起许多问题的家庭.

sentences.en: The world would be better off if there were more interracial marriages.
sentences.cn: 如果有更多的跨种族婚姻,这个世界会更好.
